text: 9.22: Zo 7.13; 16.2; 19.38; FG 5.13Ana niamuuŋ gu ndia Zudain gumgir panin rivgiap mba kameŋ nzuai. Mbe Zudain gumgir pani, mbe kha kameŋ suaŋgiap wari ki. Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the khaŋ mba guma ga suanga, Zisas Fhe Bakɨme taagip won gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav farasarigi guma ma, mbe maaŋ nzuai guma, mbe ana thɨvarga, ana mbe phorgɨv rotur muuŋgirga fhu.
